title: Verify new partner codes can be saved and appear under patron mappings
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
USER is logged into https://qa-ticketing-admin-legacy.mlb.com/ticketing-admin/vadin/HomePage
AND
Clicks on “Middleware > Workflow Mapping
AND
Year: 2023
AND
Sport: MLB
AND
Team: Baltimore Orioles
AND
Venue: Auto Selected
AND
MLB Flow: RegressVersionNumber
custom_steps:
WHEN the "Get Mappings" button is clicked
AND 'Category Group' drop down clicked and select 'Availability Setting' 
AND 'Category' drop down selected 'AVLFTR-Avaibility Filter Parameters'
AND  Click 'Add/Edit Category Values' blue link 
AND for 'Partner text' type 'TEST'
AND for 'ID/Code' type '2132018'   (Note: if this code already there then change last digit number ex. 213201#)
AND for 'Display description' type 'Test' 
AND the "Save" button is clicked

--REPEAT the process for each partner code below, saving after data entry of each--

-Availability Setting [AVLFLTR, COUPONALL, COUPON, EXTBUYT, EXTHOLD, PKEXCLDE]
-Flow Controls [ADA, ALLTIX, CNFMNUM, DFLTORDR, FLWONOFF, OFFSET, QNTYTIX, SHWDECML,TIXLMT]
-Messaging [DISTXT, EMAILTMP, MSGINBOX, SBAVAIL, SBCONF, SBINCLD, SBREV]
-Partner Account [ACCNT, ADDRT, BADDRT, CNTACTT, EMAILT, MPHONET, OAUTHPAR, PHONET, SPHONET]
-Payment & Delivery [AAPLPAY, DELVRYT, PAYMNT, PAYPREF]
-Section Display [GRPNAME, PHOTOURL, SECFLD]
-Uncategorized [[PRISCMAP]
custom_expected:
THEN the message "Partner code has been added successfully" is displayed after each partner code is saved
AND the new partner code should be displayed in the appropriate section under 'Availability Filter Parameters' section window.
